an4.276:1.1: “For insight into greed, four things should be developed.
an4.276:1.3: It’s when a mendicant develops the basis of psychic power that has immersion due to enthusiasm, and active effort.
an4.276:1.4: They develop the basis of psychic power that has immersion due to energy …
an4.276:1.7: For insight into greed, these four things should be developed.”
